name: Mark Saltveit
bio: Mark Saltveit is the World Palindrome Champion. He writes about football, Daoism and anything else you pay him for. As seen on ESPN Sportscenter, CNN (live with Anderson Cooper), NYT, LAT, Economist, Time, etc. and heard on NPR, BBC, CBC. Author of "The Tao of Chip Kelly" and "A Man, A Plan, A Palindrome."
